articles.author: Cassidy Morrison Senior
articles.title: Texas woman, 39, wakes up from back surgery with Russian and Australian accents - Daily Mail
articles.description: After back surgery, Texas native Abby Fender had lost her lifelong accent. Her vocal cords were paralyzed and about a week later she developed a Russian accent despite no links to the country.
articles.content:
A Texas woman was shocked when she woke up after surgery for a herniated disc to find her southern drawl had been replaced with a thick Russian accent.
Abby Fender, 39, found her after the procedure… [+5906 chars]
